description: Extract text content from messages, supporting multi-modal content and optional role prefixes.

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Text string, Message object with {role, content}, or array of messages to extract text from.

outputs.name: text
outputs.description: Extracted text content with optional role prefixes

settings.name: include_role
settings.description: Whether to include role prefixes in the extracted text

settings.name: role_format
settings.description: Format for role prefixes (e.g., 'USER: ', 'User: ', '[user] '). Use {role} placeholder for the role name.

settings.name: separator
settings.description: Separator between messages when processing multiple messages
